verbs.description: The MSNBC anchor [V: could] n’t finish reading a breaking report that the Trump administration has taken babies from their migrant parents .

The MSNBC anchor could n’t finish reading a breaking report that the Trump administration [V: has] taken babies from their migrant parents .
The MSNBC anchor could n’t finish reading a breaking report that [ARG0: the Trump administration] has [V: taken] [ARG1: babies] [ARG2: from their migrant parents] .
